subject: Gymnastics
lead_paragraph: Simone Biles, 17, easily won a second straight United States women’s national title in Pittsburgh, posting a two-day total of 122.550 points, more than 4 clear of Kyla Ross.
snippet: Simone Biles, 17, easily won a second straight United States women’s national title in Pittsburgh, posting a two-day total of 122.550 points, more than 4 clear of Kyla Ross.
